Play Now!
My role:

Team Lead, Gameplay Designer, Artist

September 2023 - December 3 (4 Months)

  • Created a party game themed around worms where players use word combinations to try to impress the judge!
  • Led meetings to hone our game's vision given a limited timeframe.
  • Hosted many playtests focused on creating a versatile game given a restriction on the number of cards our game could utilize.
  • Drew the cute worms on each of the cards!
